#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
long long arr[1002][1002];
int main()
{
	int t,x,y,i,j;
	long long mod;
	cin >> t;
	while(t--)
	{
		//cout << "hi" << endl;
		cin >> x >> y >> mod;
		x++;
		y++;
		/*for(i=0;i<=x;i++)
			arr[0][i] = 0;
		for(i=0;i<=y;i++)
			arr[i][0] = 0;
		//cout << "hi" << endl;*/
		arr[0][1] = 1;
		for(i=1;i<=x;i++)
		{
			//cout << "hi" << endl;
			for(j=1;j<=y;j++)
			{
				arr[i][j] = (arr[i-1][j] + arr[i][j-1]) % mod;
			}
		}
		cout << arr[x][y] << endl;
	}
}
